entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: E 23 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain and snow changing to rain near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
